info.title: HTML Handler
info.description: HTML extends DOM handler for html specific functions.

method.name: addClass
method.description: Adds a class to the given DOMElement.

parameter.name: $elem
parameter.description: The element to add the class.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure or if the class already exists.

method.name: removeClass
method.description: Removes a class from a given DOMElement.

parameter.name: $elem
parameter.description: The element to add the class.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure or if the class already exists.

method.name: hasClass
method.description: Check if the given DOMElement has a given class.

parameter.name: $elem
parameter.description: The element to check for the class.

method.returndescription: True if the element has the class, false otherwise.

method.name: select
method.description: Selects nodes in the html document that match a given css selector.

parameter.name: $css
parameter.description: The css selector to search for in the html document. It does not support pseudo-* for the moment and only supports simple equality attribute-wise. Can hold multiple selectors separated with comma.

parameter.name: $context
parameter.description: Can either be a DOMElement as the context of the search, or a css selector. If the selector results in multiple DOMNodes, then the first is selected as the context.

method.returndescription: Returns the node list that matches the given css selector, or FALSE on malformed input.
